Start.DialogueText: Hello there friend and welcome to Cyber World! It’s a pleasure to meet you!
There's plenty you need to know before we begin.
Are your ready to begin your journey in defeating the phishing foe?
Excellent! Then let’s get started.
Phishing foes are evil people who often send phishing emails to the residents of Cyber World.
These phishing emails are messages that try to steal something from their target or try to get them to do something dangerous.
Falling for these phishing emails is very easy and can have serious consequences.
Therefore, it is very important to be able to recognize these nasty emails and take the right actions to protect against them.
Your mission is to defend against these phishing foes by recognizing and dealing with their nasty emails.
To do this, you must find all parts of the email that indicate a phishing attack and respond to it appropriately.
You’ll learn about all the potential indicators and responses as you progress, so don’t worry if you’re not sure about this right away.
I’ll be here to support you and guide you throughout your journey. I believe you can do it!

MidGame.DialogueText: Let’s begin with a simple email for you to start with.
I’ll walk you through it step-by-step.
One key indicator of a phishing attack is spelling mistakes. Keep your eyes peeled for these.
First, you need to identify the indicators of the phishing email.
To do this, simply press anywhere on the email to select the part you think is suspicious.
Once done, press the ‘confirm’ button to continue.
Good job! Secondly, you must respond to the email by selecting any of the available response options underneath the email.
Nice work! You're getting the hang of it!

End.DialogueText: At the end of each of these encounters, you will be given feedback on where you were right and where you went wrong.
It's good to make mistakes, so don’t worry if this happens. It means you're learning!

Start.DialogueText: Good job on the last encounter.
It can be a lot to take in at first, but we’ll gradually go through all of this throughout the game.
If you’d like to play the trial encounter again, then press the Replay button. However, if you’d like to begin your journey then press the Start button.
Great, I’ll waste no more of your time. Let’s get to it!
I’m going to give you a new email to tackle, like the last one.
Same as before, select the indicators and then choose a response.
Remember that spelling mistakes are a great indicator to check for!
Let’s have a go at another email.
Same thing as before, but this time the indicators might not be so obvious.
Give the email a really good read and go with what you think is right.
You’ve got this!
